divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the sky about 4 am since i have seen many lights move across the sky i wanted to observe more. Standing in front of my house i was looking in the SW direction when i saw a ball of light moving across the sky at a high rate of speed i immediately moved to see where it was going since it was moving so fast NE as it moved across the sky it seemed to stop move in reverse the move forward again leaving a stream of white light and then disappearing immediately after about 30 seconds an airplane comes into view followed by two more they were in a triangular formation moving e to w the airplanes did not make ant noticeable engine noise
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were 2 other sightings in Chicago on or around June 17th 2011
Summary: Ball of ligt traviling NW to SE
